body:
+dumpsterfire to catch up on Ruqqus culture

+Ruqqus and +changelog if you want to stay on top of site news

+deuxrama for the never ending frat party

We are currently dealing with an influx of voaters who are trying to shit all over everything. It's part of free speech, but try not to let that get to you. 

Welcome to the future.
body_html:
+DumpsterFire to catch up on Ruqqus culture

+Ruqqus and +changelog if you want to stay on top of site news

+DeuxRAMA for the never ending frat party

We are currently dealing with an influx of voaters who are trying to shit all over everything. It's part of free speech, but try not to let that get to you.

Welcome to the future.

author.bio:

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!
author.bio_html:

body:
Hey, welcome to Ruqqus!

Try checking out [the settings page](https://ruqqus.com/settings). If you're on desktop, also make sure to go to the sidebar at https://ruqqus.com/all and check the categories you want to see. Some of them are hidden by default, and this isn't as clear as it should be.

Ruqqus is still new, as you probably already know, so the admins (captainmeta4, kek, and arkitekt) often make changes to the site and would appreciate the community's input on the site's direction. Make sure that you give them feedback at +Ruqqus and +changelog! (That is, if they don't ban you after you post there lol). (You can probably tell that I haven't been too happy with some of the administrative decisions here, but that isn't to say that the site is bad.)

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Hey, welcome to Ruqqus!

Try checking out the settings page. If you're on desktop, also make sure to go to the sidebar at https://ruqqus.com/all and check the categories you want to see. Some of them are hidden by default, and this isn't as clear as it should be.

Ruqqus is still new, as you probably already know, so the admins (captainmeta4, kek, and arkitekt) often make changes to the site and would appreciate the community's input on the site's direction. Make sure that you give them feedback at +Ruqqus and +changelog! (That is, if they don't ban you after you post there lol). (You can probably tell that I haven't been too happy with some of the administrative decisions here, but that isn't to say that the site is bad.)

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

Enjoy, contribute, welcome!
